Articles.Content:
Hi, seeing that there isn't an interactive in-game tutorial that teaches docking, I thought I'd just make one.

Download Docking Tutorial from Spaceport

To start the tutorial, select Start Game > Training > Docking from the main menu and follow instructions.

Please let me know what you think!

(For additional plugin discussion please also see the Addons forum thread.)

Edited August 15, 2013 by blizzy78

Trying it out now.

Docking is driving me insane and I know it's just one little detail I am missing!
Thanks, let me know how it goes! (best done in the mod's thread)
I'll give this a go! So far, only MechJeb 2 has docked stuff for me...
REALLY AMAZING!! Helped me dock for the first time! Thank you!!
Great, good to see it worked out for you
This doesn't appear to be there anymore.. and is a topic I'm needing help with... Is this available from somewhere else?
Please see this thread instead. But please notice that I've discontinued work on this, and can't guarantee it's working properly in recent KSP versions.
Not only is this tutorial not there anymore, "there" isn't there anymore since Spaceport was shut down. Closing the thread to avoid further confusion.
